Site Reliability Engineer(SRE) | Hedge-fund | Chicago, London or Dublin | ONSITE | Full time | $160k-$300k+(skill and seniority based) with great benefits

World's leading, tech-driven hedge fund looking for Site Reliability Engineers to work in the front-office solving complex problems and supporting trading infrastructure and big data applications for high frequency trading teams. A mixture of DevOps, Linux SysAdmin with a lot of scripting and automation.

Currently interviewing a lot of people from top-tier silicon valley companies and start-ups. We are looking for the best technologist in the world.
